reviewText: Rev turns out to be a smart series. No, it's not realistic in the sense that everything could have happened: it's not drama. What it does accomplish is show the human side of a well meaning character who, as it turns out, to be very human. Spoiler alert: the third series has a dark turn. Great supporting cast.  While the dvds are formatted for region 2, if you have a multi-region player, it's worth watching.
This cannot be played on American DVD players. Not sure why it's being sold here in the US>
